scene.actor



abstract class Actor;
Base class for all game objects.

Actor with geometry that can collide with other actors and move.

final Vector2f position();
Return position of this actor.

final Vector2f velocity();
Return velocity of this actor.

final PhysicsBody physics_body();
Return a reference to physics body of this actor. Will return const after D2 move.

void die();
Destroy this actor.

class ActorFactory(T);
Base class for all actor factories, template input specifies actor type the factory constructs.

Params:
position Starting position of the actor.
velocity Starting velocity of the actor.

T produce(ActorContainer container);
Return a new instance of the actor type produced by the factory with specified parameters.

Params:
ActorContainer container Container to manage the actor and any actors it creates. Should probably be the SceneManager.
